recipesJson.name: Hawaiian Pog Remix
recipesJson.author: Gwandrei
recipesJson.description: The original Hawaiian Pog is my favorite juice of all time, about 5 months ago I started this mission to create this juice that some say is impossible. It took about 60 or more attempts at getting this as close to the original as I could. If you mix this exactly as it's posted you will immediately recognize that familiar smell, but give it at least 5-7 days steep to really let the flavors come together.

reviews.text: This is always my go to recipe to mix when I'm getting tired of heavy tobaccos or creams, damn good sir.

POG is my ADV and unfortunately, for me, this doesn't taste like it. It's a decent mix but it isn't what I was expecting or wanted. 3 stars for me is finishing my 30 mL mix. I couldn't even do 20 mL of it. Might be great to some but to me, meh. I wanted other things and never even wanted to finish mine. 2/5
Awesome ADV, Epic Summer Vibe Juice

This is an excellent recipe. It is my first time trying a tropical flavored recipe, and this was a great start! The flavors blend great together. The Sweet Tangerine really comes through on the exhale. That's me trying to sound like I know what I'm talking about. Anyway, great tasting mix!
I haven't had the original in a while but this is pretty much as I remember it. Great work! CAP SS not needed.
This is my 2nd time around with this one, somehow I didn't get around to leaving a review the first time.  This is a damn addictive mix.

I haven't had the original, but holy mackerel this is a tasty recipe. It's a wonderfully balanced vape that smells like pineapples. The flavor blossoms into a magnetic blend of P, O, and G. The Passionfruit has a slight floral note that really adds an interesting flair to the recipe. Excellent work, Gwandrei. Thanks for sharing!
Never had the original; and don't need to now. This is lovely. I did use TFA Dragonfruit as I didn't have CAP but it's still tasty. It's juicy and fruity, enjoying it very much! Good job sir üëç
great Summervape, i enjoy it very much :)
